action.title: →安装插件
action.set: echo "正在安装" unzip $file -d $TOOLKIT/ echo "安装成功"

action.title: QEMU-User-Emulator
action.set: echo "- 正在尝试打开浏览器🐳" am start --user 0 -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d https://github.com/WhiteSky-Team/DogeLand-Plugins > /dev/null echo "- 完成🐳"

action.title: PulseAudio
action.desc: 为 GNU / Linux 提供音频支持
action.set: echo "- 正在尝试打开浏览器🐳" am start --user 0 -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d https://github.com/WhiteSky-Team/DogeLand-Plugins > /dev/null echo "- 完成🐳"
